```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

globalobjectremover <- function(incfuncs = F) {
  if (incfuncs == F) {
    rm(list = setdiff(ls(pos = ".GlobalEnv"), lsf.str(pos = ".GlobalEnv")), pos = ".GlobalEnv")
  } else if (incfuncs == T) {
    rm(list = ls(pos = ".GlobalEnv"), pos = ".GlobalEnv")
  } else {
    print("Error>> incfuncs has wrong variable type. Use a boolean value.")
  }
}

#globalobjectremover()
```

```{r}
#custom functions

#lateral is.na
lat.is.na <- function(x, TF = F) {
  r <- as.vector(sapply(x, is.na))
  if (TF) {
    return(r)
  } else if (!TF) {
    return(!r)
  } else {
    return("ERROR")
  }
}

#frame is.na
frame.is.na <- function(X, TF = F) {
  R <- X
  for (i in 1:nrow(X)) {
    R[i, ] <- lat.is.na(X[i, ], TF)
  }
  return(R)
}

#vector inverter
v.inv <- function(x) {
  r <- c()
  for (i in 0:length(x)) {
    r <- append(r, x[length(x) - i])
  }
  return(r)
}
```


```{r}
#large function calls

fin <- frame.is.na(prism)
```


```{r}
#deleting information-void rows and columns

fin1 <- which(apply(fin, 1, function(a) {
  sum(!a)
}) == ncol(prism))

fin2 <- which(apply(fin, 2, function(b) {
  sum(!b)
}) == nrow(prism))

names(fin1) <- NULL
names(fin2) <- NULL

fin1 <- v.inv(fin1); fin2 <- v.inv(fin2)

prism.clean <- prism[-fin1, -fin2]
fin.clean <- fin[-fin1, -fin2]
```
